targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('minute', completed_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Jobs"
FROM fax_completions
WHERE completed_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ROUND((SUM(CASE WHEN success = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::numeric / COUNT(*)) * 100, 2) as "Success Rate %"
FROM fax_completions
WHERE completed_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'

SELECT
  date_trunc('minute', completed_at) as time,
  AVG(duration_seconds) as "Avg Duration (s)"
FROM fax_completions
WHERE completed_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' AND success = true
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1
SELECT COUNT(*) as "Total" FROM fax_completions WHERE completed_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
